eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.model

Class CkanTagBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.jackan.model.CkanTagBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CkanTag

    public class CkanTagBase
extends Object
    A Ckan Tag. Tags can be free or belong to a controlled vocabulary. CkanTag holds fields that can be sent when creating a tag, while CkanTag holds more fields that can be returned with searches. Notice free tags can be created by just adding them to a dataset to create. This class initializes nothing to fully preserve all we get from ckan. In practice, all fields of retrieved resources can be null except maybe name.
    Since:
    0.4.1
    Author:
    David Leoni

      • CkanTagBase

        public CkanTagBase(String name)
        You can use this constructor when adding a free tag to a dataset.
        Parameters:
        name - the name for the new tag, a string between 2 and 100 characters long containing only alphanumeric characters and -, _ and ., e.g. 'Jazz'
